review: I've had this product for a month and I haven't regretted buying it. It's as simple as plugging the device in the back of your TV and your ready to go. You have access to a lot of apps and games when your on the dashboard. However, the one issue I have is the size of the controller. This controller is really small and I've lost it a few times.
